Package com.dimasDermawanJBusIO.controller

Interface BasicGetController<T extends Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - The Serializable entity type stored in the JSON table
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccountController, BusController, PaymentController, StationController
@RestController public interface BasicGetController<T extends Serializable>
BasicGetController defines basic CRUD GET endpoints for a REST controller managing a JSON table entity. Subinterfaces will provide implementation to return the JsonTable to operate on.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default T
    getById(int id)
    Retrieves a single entity by its unique ID.
    JsonTable<T>
    getJsonTable()
    Gets the JSON table that stores the entities.
    default List<T>
    getPage(int page, int pageSize)
    Retrieves a page of entities from the table.

  • Method Details

    • getJsonTable

      JsonTable<T> getJsonTable()
      Gets the JSON table that stores the entities. Implementing controllers provide the table instance.
      Returns:
      The JSON table storing the T entities

    • getPage

      @GetMapping("/page") default List<T> getPage(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int pageSize)
      Retrieves a page of entities from the table. Applies default paging parameters if not specified.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number (zero indexed)
      pageSize - The number of entities per page
      Returns:
      A list containing the page of entities
      See Also:
      • Algorithm

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") default T getById(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves a single entity by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The entity's unique ID
      Returns:
      The matching T entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If no entity with given ID exists
      See Also:
      • Algorithm
